text:
Minka Kelly (born Minka Dumont Dufay; June 24, 1980) is an American actress. She is most known for her roles in the television shows "Friday Night Lights" (2006–2009), "Parenthood" (2010–2011), "Charlie's Angels" (2011), and "Almost Human" (2013).
In movies, she starred as Autumn in the 2009 movie "500 Days of Summer" and as Jackie Kennedy in Lee Daniels' 2013 movie "The Butler".
